name: norbloc
membership: The company is a member of the Hyperledger consortium (link  https://www.hyperledger.org/),  which is an umbrella project of open source blockchains and related tools, started in December 2015 by the Linux Foundation, to support the collaborative development of blockchain-based distributed ledgers.
goal:
norbloc AB was founded in 2016 in Stockholm by a group of highly experienced professionals from the fields of finance and blockchain development. The company focuses on regulatory applications of blockchain technology and its flagship product, Fides, is a revolutionary KYC platform allowing GDPR compliant sharing of validated customer data and monetization on KYC services.

The team behind norbloc holds extensive experience in blockchain technology development, financial services and consulting from companies such as UBS, Lehman Brothers, ING and McKinsey & Co. The company is a core member of and frequent contributor to the Hyperledger consortium and aside from its headquarters in Stockholm, operates offices in Athens, Greece.
The Fides KYC platform has been tested by 10+ top-tier European banks and its currently being implemented across the top 4 banks in Belgium and in banking consortia in the M. East.

Our goal is to become the biggest blockchain KYC and regtech provider in the world.
interests: Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Research and Technology
euInitiatives:
